item.description: A ceiling that is not horizontal.

field.name: descending_ceiling.steepness
field.description: The distance on the Y-coordinate between the left edge and the right edge. Cannot be equal to zero.

field.name: descending_ceiling.opposite_side_is_active
field.description: Tell if the top side is active.

field.name: descending_ceiling.left_side_is_active
field.description: Tell if the left side is active.

field.name: descending_ceiling.right_side_is_active
field.description: Tell if the right side is active.

field.name: descending_ceiling.apply_angle
field.description: Tell if the angle of the slope is applied to the colliding items.
